snippet: The lawsuit claims that a reporter and a photographer were detained by military police officers outside a General Dynamics tank plant after taking photographs of it.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Toledo Blade newspaper files lawsuit against six government officials, including Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel, claiming that two of its journalists were detained unlawfully while taking pictures outside General Dynamics tank plant in Lima, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: The lawsuit claims that a reporter and a photographer were detained by military police officers outside a General Dynamics tank plant after taking photographs of it.

headline.main: Toledo Blade Sues Over Detention of Journalists at Tank Plant
headline.print_headline: Toledo Blade Sues Over Detention of Journalists at Tank Plant

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
